English version in below

◎時間：2025年1月4日 – 2025年2月2日

◎地點：立陶宛 維陶塔斯·馬格努斯大學

◎費用：250 – 650 歐元

◎報名截止時間：2024.10.14

◎報名流程

1.填寫google 表單向國際處報名，同時繳交以下文件：

Google form：https://forms.gle/WmHWBvNoCszJfmY28

在學證明
家長同意書
2.自行到姐妹校網頁報名 
3.等待姐妹校的通知
欲知詳情，請遊覽官網並參考宣傳簡章
https://balticsummeruniversity.com/

注意事項：
1.此課程為實體課程。
2.可申請獎學金，請至姊妹校官網確認資格與限制。獎學金
3.國際處僅公告或協助本校學生報名參加簽約校的短期活動或課程，其短期課程是否可抵免本校學分，參加學生需遵照教務處相關規定辦理。若活動日期為本校學期上課期間，學生須依照本校規定自行辦理請假手續。

English version

◎Period：January 4 – February 2, 2025

◎Location：Vytautas Magnus University, Lithuania

◎Fee：250 – 650 Euro

◎Registration Deadline：2024.10.14

1.Sign up via google form and upload below documents to OIA.

Google form：https://forms.gle/WmHWBvNoCszJfmY28

Student Status Certificate
Parental Consent Letter(Form：Parental Consent Letter)
2. Complete application at Baltic Summer University
3. Await the announcement from Vytautas Magnus University.
For further information, please visit their website and check out their brochure.
https://balticsummeruniversity.com/

Please note:

1.This course is a CONTACT course.
2.Scholarship is available. Please check out their website. Scholarship
3.The OIA only announces or assists our school’s students in registering for short-term activities or courses offered by contracted schools. Whether credits from these short-term courses can be transferred to our school is subject to the regulations of the Academic Affairs Office, and participating students must comply accordingly. If the activity falls within our school’s academic semester, students must follow our school’s regulations to apply for leave of absence.
